pr_title: Drop Oracle specific copy of test

timeline.bodyText:
ouch.... This is for oracle, right?
we could use oracle 12.2 and enjoy longer table names ...
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: I could not find 12.2 docker image in the wild. Let's merge this for now.
replies.author: losipiuk

timeline.message: Use shorter table identifier in test

Drop Oracle specific copy of test

Copy was there becase table identifier was too long.
After shortening copy of test is not needed.
